availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel E. DeHaven (Oldham County Owner of Coal and oil company)

body.p: Born in 1825.Incorporated Jefferson and Hardin Coal and Rock Oil Company with John Roberts, James S. Pirtle, William T. Applegate, John L Hem, Charles G. Wintersmith, S.B. Thomas, Charlton D. Shean on January 31, 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 47; Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, Passed at the Adjourned Session (January, 1865) (Frankfort: George. D. Prentice, 1865), 143.
